ygData.subject: Re: eq at work
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s the theory. The practice: D00d, can I get a SoW so I can camp that ph4t ub3r sp4wn before I level?
ygData.messageBody:
> well i'm on Mithaniel Marr right now.. starting a
> char on Firiona Vie though soon.. I really wish
> everybody roleplayed more.. <sigh>
>
> Mortoner says, in Elvish, "M'Lady, I beg of you to
> grant me the spirit of wolf.. I have a long journey
> ahead of me across treacherous lands.."
> --or--
> Dikinmyazz tells you, "d00d, can i geta SOW"
> hmmm...

That's the theory. The practice:

"D00d, can I get a SoW so I can camp that ph4t ub3r
sp4wn before I level?"

<cue large amounts of bickering over a camp on a
desirable item>

Trivial loot was an absolute failure. :(


As for the people begging for SoW's thing, I don't
even think about it anymore, it's just a reflex. SoW
anyone who hails, then after that ask if they need
something. :) Doesn't bother me in the least, SoW was
one of the major reasons I decided to start a Druid,
might as well use it. (plus, considering the amount of
time i've put into playing my rogue, I know how
frustrating it is being SoW-less) I figure if for
every fifty SoW's I cast with my Druid, someone's alt
Druid/Shammy will hopefully see fit to give my Rogue
one, and that's a damn fine deal. :)
